page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: In the area covered by this block there are four primary and two comprehensive schools.Each child from the various primary schools now at eleven years of age goes on to one of the two senior schools.The girls attending Sandbach High School and the boys to Sandbach School. However,prior to 1979,a different system existed at the secondary stage. Those children who passed the old eleven plus examination went to two grammar schools.The girls went to Congleton Grammar School,seven miles from Sandbach,and the boys to Sandbach School.Those children who failed the examination attended Sandbach Secondary Modern School. With reorganization in 1979 Sandbach Grammar School became the boy's comprehensive and the Secondary Modern the girl's comprehensive.
